widget.name: Movie Buff
widget.description:
Movie Buff is a brand new, intuitive way to pick a movie to watch on any streaming service that you use. It quickly learns your tastes and feeds you movies that are actually worth seeing.
Movie Buff does this by getting to know you better than any other movie app. In the process, it makes the unwieldy number of available movies feel more manageable.
widget.author: Vulcan Inc.
